articles.title: Rohit Sharma calls Ravi Shastri's criticism 'absolutely rubbish' - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Rohit Sharma didn't take lightly to some of the criticism directed at the team by Ravi Shastri, following India's nine-wicket defeat in the third Test against Australia. The Indian skipper termed the comments "rubbish" and said that "outsiders" didn't know wh…
